slot.name: Now
slot.description: Date format as key (no key returns time int value)

slot.name: DateFormat
slot.description: Formatted date; number and string format as key (time:format)

slot.name: Year
slot.description: Date as key (now if no key)

slot.name: Month
slot.description: Date as key (now if no key)

slot.name: Day
slot.description: Date as key (now if no key)

slot.name: DayOfWeek
slot.description: Date as key (now if no key)

slot.name: DayOfYear
slot.description: Date as key (now if no key)

slot.name: Hour
slot.description: Date as key (now if no key)

slot.name: MonthName
slot.description: Month name; number and string format as key (number:format, ex. 3:%TB - on url interface 3:%25TB)

slot.name: DayName
slot.description: Day name; number and string format as key (number:format, ex. 1:%Ta - on url interface 1:%25Ta)
